title: Flag of Latvia
cardDescription: The Latvian national flag is carmine red with white horizontal stripe. A legend refers to a mortally wounded chief of a Latvian tribe who was wrapped in a white sheet.
description: The Latvian national flag is carmine red with white horizontal stripe. A legend refers to a mortally wounded chief of a Latvian tribe who was wrapped in a white sheet. The part of the sheet on which he was lying remained white, but the two edges were stained in his blood.

content.content: The red color of the Latvian flag is a dark shade, which is composed of brown and purple. The flag's color proportions are 2:1:2 so the upper and lower red bands each being twice as wide as the central white band.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
